constituent: inspection, altar, see, telescope, eye, human legs
koohiiStory1: The beaurocracy in Japan is such that even altars need to be inspection approved. A little man with glasses comes once a year to give the altar a "visual once over" as he calls it (perhaps checking for unauthorised symbology?).
koohiiStory2: [inspection; regard as; see; look at] Inspection: you 示 show (#1086) and someone else 見 see (#57).
words: opinion, point of view, visual point
